humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the tumor size for the invasive lobular carcinoma as 2.2 cm, which falls within the range for T2 tumors (more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm). The presence of satellite foci and in situ spread does not affect the T stage for invasive lobular carcinoma. Therefore, the pathologic T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for cancer is determined by the size of the tumor. In this pathology report, it is stated that the tumor diameter is 2.2 cm. According to the TNM staging system, a T2 stage tumor has a size of 2.0 to 5.0 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
